subject: Harness Racing
Horse Racing
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
lead_paragraph: Tom Durkin, the voice of New York racing when the Saratoga meet is in session, pulled out all the stops when he went to watch his trotting colt, Coraggioso, race.
snippet: Tom Durkin, the voice of New York racing when the Saratoga meet is in session, pulled out all the stops when he went to watch his trotting colt, Coraggioso, race.
